thread.title: Great for a weekend stay!
thread.title_full: Great for a weekend stay! - Review of Hotel Astoria - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: tipsfromthefringe
title: Great for a weekend stay!
text: We've just come back from a weekend to Paris. This little hotel was in a good location for Montmartre and a metro ride/walk away from all the main attractions. We really liked how bright, airy and cheerful it was - the staff were all fantastic. Breakfast was ok - could've been better - and the cleanliness of the bathroom wasn't the best, but for a weekend it was great! All in all I'd stay at Astoria hotels again if I came to Paris for a short break - it wasn't expensive and I felt it reflected good value for money.
